## Threshold

```{r}
mtcars %>%
    chart_ist(x = hp) %>%
    add_ist(drat) %>%
    thresh_ist()
```

## Hover

```{r}
mtcars %>%
    chart_ist(x = hp) %>%
    add_ist(qsec, name = "Tooltip") %>%
    hover_ist(prefix = "$", suffix = "%")
```

## Point label

```{r}
mtcars %>%
    chart_ist(x = hp) %>%
    add_ist(wt) %>%
    label_ist()
```

## Axis Label

```{r}
mtcars %>%
    chart_ist(x = hp) %>%
    add_ist(disp) %>%
    xtitle_ist("Displacement (cu.in.)", offsety = 30)
```
